turkish_example_sentence: Ben sana pahalı hediye versem çok mutlu olursun.
english_example_sentence: If I were to give you an expensive gift, you would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я дал тебе дорогой подарок, ты был бы очень счастлив.
